metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5753 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.Description:
Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and branchprediction may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attackerwith local user access via a side-channel analysis.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5753` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.13.0-157.207
linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-157.207
linux-image-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.13.0-157.207
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500 - 3.13.0-157.207
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500mc - 3.13.0-157.207
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-smp - 3.13.0-157.207
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-emb - 3.13.0-157.207
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-157.207
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.13.0-157.207
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.13.0-157.207
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-111.134~14.04.1

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.13.0-157.207').
linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-grouper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-lts-wily: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-111.134~14.04.1').

linux-azure package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1').
firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '57.0.4+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-384 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '384.111-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
